attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Parking on residential streets to be prohibited between the hours of 2:30 a.m. and 6:00 a.m.

Exemptions to be granted only by the police and subject to providing the full name and address of the vehicle owner, the address where the vehicle is parked, vehicle make and colour, and license plate number.

The maximum number of exemptions to be 5 times per 30 days.

No exemptions allowed when it is snowing and/or there is at least two inches of snowfall.
